title: Mapu Organic BCN
description:
A friendly, family-run store in the city centre. Speaks fluent English, Spanish and Catalan. Stocks a wide range of veggie food (seasonal vegetables, grains, muesli, tinned & refrigerated food) & drink (including wine & spirits), plus food supplements, superfoods, cosmetics & cleaning products. Also specialists in green parenting stocking a range of washable and biodegradeable nappies (diapers), baby-carriers, slings, organic cotton clothes and baby-care products.
The store is 95% vegan (since a few cosmetics contain wax and sell Catalan honey). Uses local producers when possible.
